mapper.select: select p.product_no ,p.product_name ,p.product_price , ss.shop_name from (select pt.product_no , pt.product_name , min(pp.product_price) product_price from product_price pp , product pt where pt.product_no = pp.product_no group by pt.product_no, pt.product_name) p , product_price pp1 left join shops ss on pp1.shop_id = ss.shop_id where p.product_price = pp1.product_price
